description:
Experienced and dedicated, our team at Grant Law Office has returned millions of dollars to victims of personal injury incidents. We are based in Atlanta, Georgia, and advocate for people across the state who have suffered the following:

  • Medical malpractice and legal malpractice
  • Car, truck and motorcycle accidents
  • Product liability
  • Wrongful death
  • Birth and brain injuries
  • Construction accidents

Our law office comprises a husband-and-wife team with more than 30 years of practice holding defendants accountable for our clients' damages. We know the serious effects that a catastrophic injury can cause, including physical, financial and emotional losses. Since we opened our doors, we have used a client-focused approach to secure maximum compensation. That means that we take into account our client's goals for the case as well as all the ways their life has been affected.

This strategy is part of the reason we hold honors such as earning a listing in The National Trial Lawyers: Top 100. Additionally, attorney Wayne Grant has been included in Georgia Super Lawyers since 2005 and is AV Preeminent peer-review rated,* the highest rating, through Martindale-Hubbell. The American Board of Professional Liability Attorneys has also certified him in medical malpractice law.

Grant Law Office offers free initial consultations as well as virtual appointments. We also accept credit cards.

* AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer-review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingsTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
